data.content:
**Answer – Has Donald Trump received a Nobel Peace Prize?** *No. As of the latest news (October 9‑10 2025), Donald Trump has **not** been awarded the Nobel Peace Prize. The Nobel Committee’s decision is still pending, with the official announcement expected on Friday (the day after the articles were published).* --- ### What the recent press is saying | Date (UTC) | Source | Headline (link) | Key points | |------------|--------|-----------------|------------| | **2025‑10‑09** | **Yahoo Entertainment** | *“Norway on Edge Over Trump Ahead of Nobel Peace Prize Verdict”* ([link](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/norway-edge-over-trump-ahead-113529572.html)) | – Norway’s Nobel Committee is under intense pressure from Trump’s campaign.
– Trump publicly claims he “deserves” the prize.
– The committee is expected to announce the winner on Friday. | | **2025‑10‑09** | **Bloomberg** | *“Tension in Norway ahead of Nobel Peace Prize verdict”* ([link](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2025-10-09/norway-on-edge-over-trump-ahead-of-nobel-peace-prize-verdict)) | – Media and diplomats worry about diplomatic fallout if Trump is either honored or rejected.
– The Nobel Peace Prize “verdict” is still a secret. | | **2025‑10‑09** | **Memeorandum.com** (citing Bloomberg) | *“Norway on Edge Over Trump Ahead of Nobel Peace Prize Verdict (Heidi Taksdal Skjeseth/Bloomberg)”* ([link](https://www.memeorandum.com/251009/p31)) | Mirrors Bloomberg’s coverage; adds that the Norwegian public is divided. | | **2025‑10‑09** | **Biztoc.com** (Newsweek) | *“Ukraine Issues Conditions for Nominating Trump for Nobel Peace Prize”* ([link](https://biztoc.com/x/78c121a7400cc1e7)) | – Ukrainian President Zelensky says Kyiv would nominate Trump *if* he successfully halts Russia’s war after his Gaza cease‑fire push.
– Shows political maneuvering around the nomination. | | **2025‑10‑09** | **Washington Post** (via Memeorandum) | *“Trump wants a Nobel Prize. He’ll learn Friday if his campaign paid off.”* ([link](https://www.memeorandum.com/251009/p18)) | – Summarises Trump’s long‑standing quest for the prize and the “global scramble” it has triggered. | | **2025‑10‑09** | **PBS NewsHour** | *“What world leaders said after Trump announced first steps in Israel‑Hamas agreement”* ([link](https://www.pbs.org/newshour/world/what-world-leaders-said-after-trump-announced-first-steps-in-israel-hamas-agreement)) | – Highlights praise for Trump’s “first phase” of a Gaza‑Israel cease‑fire, which is being positioned as a peace‑building achievement that could bolster his Nobel hopes. | | **2025‑10‑09** | **ABC News** | *“Trump draws international praise as broker of Israel‑Hamas deal”* ([link](https://abcnews.go.com/International/trump-draws-international-praise-broker-israel-hamas-deal/story?id=126356500)) | – Reinforces the narrative that Trump’s diplomatic activity is a catalyst for Nobel speculation. | #### Overall picture - **There is no official Nobel Peace Prize award to Trump yet.** All the articles are about *anticipation* of the decision, lobbying efforts, and political reactions. - The Norwegian Nobel Committee is under heightened scrutiny because of Trump’s self‑promotion and the diplomatic ramifications of either awarding or rejecting him. - Trump’s recent diplomatic moves (a cease‑fire deal between Israel and Hamas, and promises to stop Russian aggression in Ukraine) are being framed by his supporters as qualifying achievements for the peace prize. --- ### Bottom line for your request You asked for news about **whether Trump got a Nobel Peace Prize**. The current media coverage (as of October 10 2025) indicates that **the award has not been granted yet**; the decision will be announced shortly (the next day). The surrounding news focuses on the political pressure, Trump’s public claims, and the reactions of world leaders as the Nobel Committee prepares its verdict.

task_agent_pairs.task_name: search for news articles on a specific topic
task_agent_pairs.task_description: Search for recent news articles that discuss whether former President Donald Trump has been awarded, nominated for, or mentioned in relation to a Nobel Peace Prize. Retrieve each article's headline, publication date, source (publisher), and provide a brief summary or link for each.

primary.name: Orbimesh News Agent
primary.description: Fetches news articles from a wide range of sources via the NewsAPI. It can search for articles on any topic or retrieve top business headlines from specific countries.
capabilities: search for news articles on a specific topic
get top business headlines from a country

endpoints.description: Searches for news articles matching a keyword or query. Ideal for finding news about a specific company, person, or event.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search keyword or phrase (e.g., 'Tesla', 'stock market trends').

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO-639-1 code of the language you want to get articles in (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr').

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (maximum 100).

endpoints.description: Provides live top business headlines for a specific country.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for (e.g., 'us', 'gb', 'in').

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page (maximum 100).

fallbacks.name: ScholarAI Agent
fallbacks.description: A powerful research assistant that interacts with the ScholarAI API. It can perform semantic searches for scholarly papers, read full-text documents, analyze entire projects with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), and manage research projects.
capabilities: search for scholarly papers and abstracts
read the full text of a paper
analyze a project of papers with specific questions
add a paper to a research project

endpoints.description: Retrieves relevant abstracts and metadata for scholarly papers by semantic search. It can also generate a summary of the papers.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Search keywords for articles (must be in English).

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The natural language query or question that the search results should answer.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The order to sort the results by. Can be 'relevance', 'cited_by_count', or 'publication_date'.

parameters.name: peer_reviewed_only
parameters.description: Set to true to only return peer-reviewed articles.

parameters.name: start_year
parameters.description: The starting year for the search range (inclusive).

parameters.name: end_year
parameters.description: The ending year for the search range (inclusive).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The pagination offset for the search results.

endpoints.description: Retrieves the full text of a paper, returned in sections or 'chunks'. Can also retrieve associated figures and images.

parameters.name: pdf_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the PDF, prefixed with 'PDF_URL:' or 'PROJ:'.

parameters.name: chunk
parameters.description: The section or chunk number of the text to retrieve.

endpoints.description: Analyzes all papers within a specified project to answer one or more questions using retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: The name of the project to analyze.

parameters.name: analysis_mode
parameters.description: The analysis mode. Can be 'comprehensive' for a detailed report or 'tabular' for a structured table.

parameters.name: question
parameters.description: A list of one or more questions to be answered for each paper in the project.

endpoints.description: Adds a paper to a specified research project using its unique identifier.

parameters.name: paper_id
parameters.description: The paper identifier (e.g., DOI, PMID, SS_ID, ARXIV).

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: The name of the project to add the paper to. Defaults to the 'GPT' project if not specified.

final_response:

completed_tasks.task_name: search for news articles on a specific topic

articles.author: Elena Becatoros, Associated Press
articles.title: What world leaders said after Trump announced first steps in Israel-Hamas agreement
articles.description: World leaders on Thursday expressed hope for peace and urged Israel and Hamas to fulfill their commitments in the hours after President Donald Trump announced that the parties had agreed to the “first phase” of a deal signaling a major breakthrough in the two…

articles.author: Heidi Taksdal Skjeseth
articles.title: Norway on Edge Over Trump Ahead of Nobel Peace Prize Verdict
articles.description: Trump’s aggressive push to secure the prize, including public declarations he deserves it and calls to Norwegian officials, has intensified with a ceasefire ...

articles.title: Norway on Edge Over Trump Ahead of Nobel Peace Prize Verdict (Heidi Taksdal Skjeseth/Bloomberg)
articles.description:
Heidi Taksdal Skjeseth / Bloomberg:
Norway on Edge Over Trump Ahead of Nobel Peace Prize Verdict  —  Norway is bracing for the aftermath of the Nobel Peace Prize announcement on Friday as the Nordic nation has faced increasing pressure from Donald Trump and h…

articles.author: newsweek.com
articles.title: Ukraine Issues Conditions for Nominating Trump for Nobel Peace Prize
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Thursday that Kyiv would nominate U.S. President Donald Trump for the Nobel Peace Prize if he succeeds in stopping Russia’s military actions in Ukraine after his U.S. counterpart announced a ceasefire in Israel’s wa…

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Tension in Norway ahead of Nobel Peace Prize verdict
articles.description: Trump’s campaign has thrust Oslo into an uncomfortable spotlight, with media and observers worrying about the diplomatic and economic fallout should the Norwegian Nobel Committee snub him

articles.author: Kevin Shalvey
articles.title: Trump draws international praise as broker of Israel-Hamas deal
articles.description: Israeli President Isaac Herzog thanked Trump "for his incredible leadership."

articles.author: AP- PTI
articles.title: Hungarian writer Laszlo Krasznahorkai wins Nobel Prize in literature
articles.description: Hungarian writer Laszlo Krasznahorkai wins Nobel Prize in literature for his unique, philosophical novels in single sentences.

articles.title: Trump wants a Nobel Prize. He'll learn Friday if his campaign paid off. (Washington Post)
articles.description:
Washington Post:
Trump wants a Nobel Prize.  He'll learn Friday if his campaign paid off.  —  President Donald Trump's long quest for a Nobel Peace Prize has sparked an unusual global scramble.  —  Just now  —  Of all the golden glories that Donald Trump has …
